EmailTemplate.description: Friendly reminder: Your First Aid certification on file with Daring Adventures has EXPIRED
EmailTemplate.name: FirstAidAlreadyExp
EmailTemplate.subject: Friendly reminder: Your First Aid certification on file with {!Organization.Name} has EXPIRED
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
We want to remind you that your CPR certification will expire on {!Contact.CPR_Certificate_Expiration_Date__c}. Please make sure to renew it soon!
Thanks from all of us at {!Organization.Name}. We will see you soon!
For any questions, comments or concerns you can contact Brenna or Sarah.
Brenna Bean, CTRS
Program Coordinator
brenna@daring-adventures.org
602-290-0214 ext. 103
Sarah Lindvay, CTRS
Healthy Day Recreation Program Coordinator
sarah@daring-adventures.org
(602) 290-0214 ext 1
